attributes.title: Nick Scarpino Is James Bond (Kinda)
attributes.description: In the season finale of The PlayStation VR Show, Agent 0069 Nick Scarpino jumps into the world of I Expect You to Die!Shout-out to https://twitter.com/16BitsOfAwesome for the thumbnail!Keep the lights on and get every episode a week early: http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygamesSubscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/storeHey, FTC, PlayStation sent us this PSVR unit for review. Maybe even the game.Follow us on Twitter!Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettysGreg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggyKinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVidsEvery day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

attributes.title: Greg Gets in a Drunkn Bar Fight
attributes.description: Let's drink and play Drunkn Bar Fight! PSX 2017 reinvigorated Greg when it comes to PSVR, so he's made a show catching everyone up on the games they've missed since launch!
